text: O sar'inanii on e diina kan, konko ko O yamirnoo Nuuhu, e kon ko Men wahayini e maaɗa, e kon ko Men yamirnoo Ibraahiima, e Muusaa e Iisaa, wonnde: "Ñiɓnee diina kan; hara on seertaali e makka". Kono Ko noddotaa sirkooɓe ɓen e mun kon, mawnii e dow maɓɓe. Allah non hino suɓanoo ɗum, mo O muuyani, O fewna e Makko, kala tuuboowo
